attributes.action: Stop MP's wages after 29th March 2019, until Brexit solution!
attributes.additional_details:
The entire house of commons do not represent the people, they are constantly pointing their fingers at each other, there is no co-operation between the two major parties.

They are playing with the minds of ordinary people, we all understand that a lot people are not happy about the result or the referendum, but that was nearly 3 years ago, get on with it, the majority told you what to do now do it!
attributes.background:
MP's have voted to delay Brexit despite the damage it is doing to people and businesses across the UK and Europe.

We want to know where we are going as a country and plan our own futures, just get on with it and find common ground!

MP's wages should be stopped for the entire extention period!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
